summary: An Ordinance appropriating the sum of Three Thousand Three hundred and Seventy-five ($3,375.00) dollars, from the Lighting Fund of the City of Seattle, to pay the Lighting Department's proportion of the cost of the improvement of First Avenue and First Avenue South from Weller Street to Virginia Street, by the installation of a system of Cluster Lights, under Ordinance No. 15606, creating Local Improvement District No. 1443.
